lead_paragraph: Seventh seed Richard Gasquet will have to put aside his long friendship with fellow Frenchman Jo-Wilfried Tsonga when they do battle in the Wimbledon fourth round on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Gasquet to Face Old Pal Tsonga in Wimbledon Last 16
headline.main: Gasquet to Face Old Pal Tsonga in Wimbledon Last 16

snippet: Seventh seed Richard Gasquet will have to put aside his long friendship with fellow Frenchman Jo-Wilfried Tsonga when they do battle in the Wimbledon fourth round on Monday....
